Verses.1: In those days John the Baptist came, preaching in the wilderness of Judea, saying,
Verses.2: "Repent, for the Kingdom of Heaven approaches quickly."
Verses.3:
For this is who the prophet Isaiah spoken of when he said,

"The voice of one crying out in the wilderness.
Prepare the way of the LORD,
	make his paths straight."
Verses.4: Now John himself had clothes made of camel's hair, and a leather belt around his waist. His food was locusts and wild honey.
Verses.5: The people went out to him from Jerusalem, across Judea, and the whole region of the Jordan.
Verses.6: They were being baptized by him in the Jordan River, while they confessed their sins.

InlineTitles.1: John the Baptist Prepares the Way
